document_data.name: Nezram's Amethyst Aura
document_data.mainbody: '''Nezram's amethyst aura''' was an [[abjuration]] spell shielding the subject from [[poison]] and [[disease]]. It was presumably developed by [[Nezram]].
document_data.Effect: The subject of ''Nezram's amethyst aura'' was encompassed by a bright violet light that blocked all poisons and diseases from penetrating, whether by a weapon or a creature's touch or bite. It did not however cure such things already affecting the target.
document_data.Components: The spell required a pinch of [[amethyst]] dust.
